Articles.Content:
I was wondering if there's a mod that strengthens docking ports. Or, one that allows us to strut things while EVA'd. Strengthened to the point in which I can connect two ships and fly them as one to a new location.

Thanks and happy gaming.

Strenghtens docking ports... Kerbal Joint Reinforcement can do that

Strut Things while EVA... Kerbal Attachment System

I have both of those mods but have never seen the option to strut while EVA'd. KJR, I haven't really seen much difference in the docking ports being stronger. Is there a special docking port that I've missed? Thanks.

I have both of those mods but have never seen the option to strut while EVA'd. KJR, I haven't really seen much difference in the docking ports being stronger. Is there a special docking port that I've missed? Thanks.

When building your ship, look in Utilities. There are Strut Endpoints that you can attach to your ship. When you're in space, an EVA'd Kerbal an grab, attach, and link these strut endpoints.

When building your ship, look in Utilities. There are Strut Endpoints that you can attach to your ship. When you're in space, an EVA'd Kerbal an grab, attach, and link these strut endpoints.

Ah, thank you very much.
